author: mwomack
msg: Added code to set the property "log4j.remoteSourceInfo" in the event.  For socket related receivers, the value will be the remote host and port (as reported by the Socket object).  For JMS it will be the topic factory and topic information.

author: mwomack
msg: Changes to display and filter the MDC values.

author: mwomack
msg: Added getMDCKeySet() method to return an unmodifiable set of the keys in the MDC.  If the MDC is null, then an empty set is returned.
